cuisine_overview.description: Jharkhand's cuisine reflects its tribal heritage, forest resources, and agricultural traditions. The food is simple, nutritious, and deeply connected to the land and seasons.
cuisine_overview.description_hindi: झारखंड का व्यंजन इसकी आदिवासी विरासत, वन संसाधनों और कृषि परंपराओं को दर्शाता है। भोजन सरल, पौष्टिक और भूमि और मौसमों से गहराई से जुड़ा हुआ है।
key_characteristics: Forest-based ingredients (mahua, bamboo shoots, wild mushrooms)
Traditional cooking methods (clay pots, wood fire)
Minimal use of spices, emphasis on natural flavors

traditional_dishes.name: Dhuska
traditional_dishes.description: Deep-fried rice and lentil pancakes, crispy outside and soft inside
traditional_dishes.description_hindi: चावल और दाल के गहरे तले हुए पैनकेक, बाहर से कुरकुरे और अंदर से नरम
traditional_dishes.best_served_with: Aloo chokha (mashed potatoes) or ghugni (spiced chickpeas)
traditional_dishes.cultural_significance: Traditional breakfast dish, often served during festivals

traditional_dishes.name: Handia
traditional_dishes.description: Traditional rice beer made by tribal communities using natural fermentation
traditional_dishes.description_hindi: आदिवासी समुदायों द्वारा प्राकृतिक किण्वन का उपयोग करके बनाई जाने वाली पारंपरिक चावल की बीयर
traditional_dishes.cultural_significance: Sacred drink used in religious ceremonies and social gatherings
traditional_dishes.where_to_find: Tribal villages, cultural festivals, some homestays

traditional_dishes.name: Chilka Roti
traditional_dishes.description: Thin, crispy rice flour bread cooked on clay tawa
traditional_dishes.description_hindi: मिट्टी की तवा पर पकाई जाने वाली पतली, कुरकुरी चावल के आटे की रोटी
traditional_dishes.best_served_with: Vegetable curries, dal, or meat dishes
traditional_dishes.cultural_significance: Daily bread for tribal communities, represents simplicity and tradition

traditional_dishes.name: Bamboo Shoot Curry
traditional_dishes.description: Tender bamboo shoots cooked with minimal spices, highlighting natural flavors
traditional_dishes.description_hindi: कम मसालों के साथ पकाए गए नरम बांस के अंकुर, प्राकृतिक स्वाद को उजागर करते हैं
traditional_dishes.cultural_significance: Represents forest-based lifestyle and sustainable food practices

traditional_dishes.name: Mahua Ladoo
traditional_dishes.description: Sweet balls made from mahua flowers, a traditional tribal delicacy
traditional_dishes.description_hindi: महुआ के फूलों से बने मीठे गोले, एक पारंपरिक आदिवासी व्यंजन
traditional_dishes.cultural_significance: Sacred flower used in religious ceremonies, represents tribal connection to nature
traditional_dishes.where_to_find: Tribal villages, local markets, cultural festivals

traditional_dishes.name: Aloo Chokha
traditional_dishes.description: Mashed potatoes with onions, green chilies, and mustard oil
traditional_dishes.description_hindi: प्याज, हरी मिर्च और सरसों के तेल के साथ मैश किए गए आलू
traditional_dishes.cultural_significance: Comfort food representing home cooking and simplicity

traditional_dishes.name: Pitha
traditional_dishes.description: Steamed rice cakes with sweet or savory fillings
traditional_dishes.description_hindi: मीठे या नमकीन भरावन के साथ भाप में पकाए गए चावल के केक
traditional_dishes.cultural_significance: Traditional festival food, represents celebration and community

traditional_dishes.name: Kadhi Badi
traditional_dishes.description: Yogurt-based curry with fried lentil dumplings
traditional_dishes.description_hindi: तले हुए दाल के गोले के साथ दही आधारित करी
traditional_dishes.cultural_significance: Comfort food, often served during family gatherings

ranchi: Local restaurants serving traditional Jharkhand cuisine
netarhat: Hill station cuisine with local ingredients

general_guidelines: Use right hand for eating (left hand is considered unclean)
Try to eat with locals when possible
Ask about ingredients if you have allergies
tribal_customs: Don't refuse traditional drinks like Handia
Participate in communal eating when invited
Learn basic greetings in local languages
religious_considerations: Don't consume alcohol in sacred spaces
Follow local customs during religious ceremonies

food_markets.name: Ranchi Main Market
food_markets.description: Large market with traditional Jharkhand ingredients and street food

food_markets.name: Tribal Village Markets
food_markets.description: Authentic tribal food ingredients and traditional crafts

food_markets.name: Deoghar Food Market
food_markets.description: Pilgrimage food market with traditional sweets and snacks

cooking_experiences.name: Tribal Cooking Workshop
cooking_experiences.description: Learn traditional Santhal cooking methods and recipes

cooking_experiences.name: Forest Food Experience
cooking_experiences.description: Learn about forest-based ingredients and traditional cooking

cooking_experiences.name: Homestay Cooking Class
cooking_experiences.description: Cook with local families and learn traditional recipes

vegan_options: Many traditional dishes are naturally vegan
gluten_free: Traditional breads made from rice flour
allergies: Common allergens: Mustard oil, certain forest ingredients
Traditional cooking uses minimal processed ingredients
